name: Catlactic Beats - Global Game Jam 2021
description:
Summary

In Catlactic Beats, you play as the Cat-stronaut, who just landed on a new planet. Unfortunately, Ralbator the pi-rat and his crew stole your spaceship, preventing you to go back home. Following the beat of the evil rats, you will have to use your agility and the appropriate items to claim what is yours ! 
This game was produced for Global Game Jam 2021 and made under 48h.

Controls

  • Walk : Arrow keys
  • Jump : Space
  • Reset Position : R
  • Use Items :
    • Super Claws : 1
    • Jetpack : 2
    • Laser Gun : 3
    • Catnip : 4 (while under the effect of Catnip, the Cat-Stronaut is only able to walk)
  • Enable/Disable the "RRrrreal" Mode : 0

Credits

  • Alizé Martinez - 2D Artist
  • Benjamin Le Roux - 2D Artist & Animations
  • Charles Potier - 2D Artist & Animations
  • Axel Déret - Developer
  • Adrien Ronté - Developer
  • Emmanuel Barreau - Developer
  • Rémi Piérot - Sound Designer
